title: Why am i not getting accepted into the pbe
body: It has been a couple of months straight and i have had what i'm suppose to do, becuase im lvl 30 and have the requirements.

replies.body: There's no way to guarantee acceptance into the PBE or expedite an application.  There are some factors to help determine eligibility such as having an account in positive standing but doesn't guarantee it.  We have a[ PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq) that can shed some light on getting accepted.  Best of luck with your application!
